game.title: The Lost Treasure Quest
game.description: In this quest, you embark on an adventure to find the long-lost treasure. Follow the clues, solve puzzles, and conquer challenges at these locations:
game.reward: 300 gold coins, a rare artifact, and the title of Treasure Hunter

task.objective: Discover the first clue at the Old Lighthouse
task.description: A broken stone near the entrance holds your first clue. Be ready!

task.objective: Decipher the secret message at the Ancient Library
task.description: Unravel the hidden message in an old book to advance.

task.objective: Obtain the golden key at Crystal Falls cautiously
task.description: The key lies guarded, be cautious of danger!

task.objective: Solve the final riddle at Haunted Hill Mansion
task.description: The mansion's doors hold the answer to progress.

task.objective: Unearth the treasure at the Secret Island
task.description: Beneath the palm tree, Captain Jack's prize awaits!
